programme.title: La Rochelle (Sn 4 Ep 3)
programme.desc: Part of a gorgeous collection of mysteries, each one set in a different, picturesque region of France. Childhood cruelties from decades ago fuel revenge in La Rochelle, France. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Don Matteo
programme.desc: Don Matteo is a thoroughly ordinary Catholic priest with an extraordinary ability to solve crimes. Don Matteo witnesses a crime during a bus expedition for senior citizens. Italian with English subtitles.

programme.desc: Part of a gorgeous collection of mysteries, each one set in a different, picturesque region of France. A sister and brother in Haute-Savoie investigate a series of deaths and uncover a few secrets of their own. French with English subtitles.

programme.title: Magellan
programme.desc: Inspector and family man Simon Magellan unravels crimes and mysteries in the fictional French town of Saignac. Someone had it in for a local celebrity - a figure skating champion turned coach. French with English subtitles.
